content:
two people were stabbed close to the University of Connecticuts Hilltop Apartments Saturday night PERIOD

Police were called to the scene at about  p.m PERIOD to see two victims with stab wounds an Eyewitness News article said PERIOD

The two victims were sent to Windham Hospital and received stitches along with other treatments for minor injuries UConn spokesperson Stephanie Reitz said PERIOD

The victims have since been released the Eyewitness article said PERIOD

An active investigation is taking place PERIOD Police said the attack was not random announcing that the attacker knew both victims PERIOD

Parents began to post about the incident on a UConn parent Facebook page according to recounts from their children who lived close enough to the scene of the crime to see what was happening PERIOD

According to the Facebook page multiple students residing in Hilltop Apartments witnessed emergency vehicles and police forces on campus before any emergency alert had been sent out by the university PERIOD

Any potential crime charges will be up to the States Attorneys Office officials said PERIOD
